wiki.content: "The Show" is the debut single by Australian singer/songwriter Lenka that was released in December 2008 - June 2009. The song is featured on her eponymous debut album Lenka, released in 2008. The single was successful in Vietnam, where it peaked as #1 in Radio Vietnam. It was featured as the soundtrack for an Old Navy commercial as well as an Ugly Betty season 3 promo, the film Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging, the 2009 Spring Campaign of the Polish TV station TVN, a commercial for a Malaysian telecommunications company called TM in 2009, in a 2010 commercial for French insurance GMF, and was promoted as an iTunes Free Single of the Week. Samples from the song are featured on DFS Sofa commercials in the UK. The song was also covered by Kerris Dorsey in the movie Moneyball and appears on its soundtrack. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
